body.name: HLTPRO 3 Pack Plus Size Leggings for Women - High Waist Stretchy Soft Yoga Pants for Workout Running
features: Essential Wardrobe Staple: These Capri Leggings are the versatile and comfortable piece your closet needs. Dress them up with a blouse and heels for a night out, or keep it casual with a t-shirt and sneakers for a day on the go. Once you put them on, you won't want to take them off!

High Waist & 4-Way Stretch: The high-rise waistband of the leggings provides a comfortable fit and helps to flatten the belly, no roll and do not ride up. They're made from 4-way stretch fabric and super-soft fabric that smooths and flatters and fit like a second skin

More Sizes & About Details: When you have a curvy body, finding the perfect plus-size capri leggings can be as difficult. We are specially made for the plus-size figure, that is available in Large to 4X-Large, suitable for all size ladies and pregnant women. Whichever way you style these, you’ll be glad to have them in your rotation.

Fit for Most Occasions: Whether you're running errands or workout, the leggings hold you in, and have a flexible stretch that moves with you. Perfect for yoga, exercise, fitness, Pilates, jogging, camping, hiking, working, and everyday outfits. Plus, they're also comfortably lounging at home.

Customer Services & Care: Please wash with like color, Machine wash cold, Do not bleach, and Do not iron. If you have any issues with HLTPRO leggings, please feel free to let us know and we will do our best to handle them.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HLTPRO Plus Size Capri Leggings Are you looking for the perfect pair of leggings to wear while you're doing sports, yoga, running, or just lounging around? Look no further than HLTPRO High-Waisted Capri Leggings!

High Waist Capri Leggings The high-waisted design of the capri leggings for women provides a comfortable fit and helps to flatten the tummy. Super-soft and skin-friendly fabrics can make you feel comfy and breathable. Super Stretchy & Non-see Through These yoga leggings are made of 4-way Stretch fabric is comfortable to wear and provides freedom of movement, will not see through when you running, fitness.

Choose from size L to 4XL Don't worry about your size!!! Plus size capri leggings created to move with you. We have designed more sizes for plus women curvy body and pregnant women, from L/ XL to 4XL. You will find a suitable size in our shop. Tips: Please buy 1 size up from the size you usually wear.
These plus size capri leggings are suitable for leisure, sports, home, any different occasions, this is a great choice to bring you the most comfortable experience!
Fit for Most Occasions HLTPRO leggings are durable, functional and flattering! Perfect for fitness, gym, yoga, workouts, jogging, exercise, hiking, biking, walking around the house, and everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy and Sofy
reviews.reviewText: The material is extremely soft and stretchy without it stretching too much. I am 5' 6" and the length is just right, even if they shrink a bit up my leg they will still be comfortably long enough. I'm working on weight loss and I've lost it noticeably in my leg especially my thighs but they fit so nicely I'm wearing them with tunics and t-shirts. I bought them mainly to wear while I ride my recumbent exercise bike and they are WONDERFUL for that too! I am 230lbs and sill have some fat to lose around my tummy and thighs but the XXL fits just right. My husband thought I looked pretty good in them so they are flattering even if you don't have perfect legs, butt and thighs. :) I have washed 2 of the 3 pair and they washed and dried nicely - not too much shrinkage at all. I recently bought another set - in different colors I love them so much!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are actually nice
reviews.reviewText: I'll be honest I wasn't expecting much out of these given the low price and that they come in a pack of three. Most of the time clothes like that are pretty cheap, but these are actually pretty nice. The only complaint I have is the chemical smell when you first take them from the bag, but I put them in the wash and it went away. I have been wearing them around the house and even to work with a long tunic. They are thin enough to wear under a skirt and thick enough to wear with a long shirt. I haven't broken out or had as rash so whatever the smell was must have just been from the packaging or something. I just know that I am buying some more because these are super comfy and they are true to size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and not sheer
reviews.reviewText: These are fantastic. So so soft. Nice stretch. Wide yoga pants style waist (without the fold over). Ordered 3x. I'm basically a 2 or 3x for everything. I'm beyond happy with these. Target discontinued my favorite leggings so I was looking for something close. These are so much better. Will be ordering more asap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was due to get rid of several pairs of leggings and replacing them with a new ones. After reading many reviews, I chose this three pack. Overall, I am very happy with them. They are extremely well-made and the fabric is buttery soft. They fit true to size with lots of stretch. They stay in place thanks to the high waistband. My only disappointment is that they are quite lightweight. They stay in place thanks to the high waistband. My only disappointment is the fabric thickness. I was looking for something to wear through the winter. I will wear them, but I don’t think they’ll keep me very warm if I need to spend any amount of time outside in the cold Maine chill.Otherwise, these are perfect, and were it not for my expectations of a heavier fabric, I would’ve given them five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I usually dont buy leggings online because I have had bad expirences, but these leggings are grat they are really strechy and are not see through like most. The material is soft and so comfortable to move, feels like silk (sort of ).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to try them out, selected my size based on the size chart in the pics but didn't have much hope because I have issues getting clothes online. I absolutely loved these when they arrived. They look small but stretch very well and are super soft. I like that these will still fit even when I lose a bit of weight because of the material used and the stretch. There is just a tad bit of transparency (a very tiny bit if you look very closely) in the butt area but I have a large butt for them to stretch over, if you do also I would plan to wear longer shirts to cover your butt or size up 1 size if it's an issue. I bought these to wear under shorter dresses when it's cold and to wear with shirts in the spring. These do not offer tummy control (fine with me) and do not slide down when walking around like tights do. I have several months to drop a few lbs before spring and if I don't get there then I'll come back and get 2 more packs in a larger size (I work in a school so I would need 100% opaqueness in the butt area to wear with a regular shirt come spring). The price is great , less than $30 for a 3pk. After trying on I came back to Amazon right away and bought 2 more packs of the same size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They are okay
reviews.reviewText: For the price they are decent leggings but they aren’t what I was looking for. First I got the wrong size Amazon suggested 4x but the weight chart suggested 3x so I went with 3 but they are kinda small 4 would have been better. Second I was looking for something similar to popfit leggings I LOVE them they are just $50 a pair but they have a completely different feel they are more spandex feeling where as these are velvety which I don’t like because I have pets and these pick up hair like crazy. I like that these have pockets but I wouldn’t call them deep compared to popfit. But anyway if you want a cheap set these might be for you as long as you want velvety leggings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I always have a hard time finding clothes that fit well and these really seem to fit like a glove! They're not see through like other brands I've tried and they are incredibly comfortable. I also love the higher waist which adds some support for tummy control. As long as these hold up through the wash cycle, I will definitely be buying more!!
They look good and are soft.
Every day wear..Comfortable and wash nicely.
They are very lightweight , perfect for summer. I find the waistband too high but can work with it
